name: Livepeer
challengeTitle: Best Creator, Gaming or Metaverse App
challengeDesc: Technicality, originality, practicality and WOW factor.
benefitIntro: Our team has completed a livestreeming integration for easy RTMP streaming over the Livepeer platform.
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX will encourage livestreaming from anywhere at anytime.
benefit2: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX will encourage consuming livestreams while on-the-go.
benefit3: Receive real-time notifications of your favorite livestreams using Ava's Push Notification Service (APNS.io).
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with Livepeer Inc.
